name: Beyond Key Systems
description:
Beyond Key is a global company with 12+ years of experience specializing in consulting, technology, and outsourcing solutions and catering to clients in the United States, Australia, UK, and Germany. We are a Microsoft Certified Gold Partner headquartered in Chicago US.
We're a team of well-qualified engineers that make us a pioneer in industries such as Healthcare, Logistics, Insurance, E-commerce, Entertainment, Automobile etc.
 
Differentiators
Microsoft Certified Gold Partner
A highly skilled team of 100+ experts in a diverse tech stack
Working on advanced areas such as the Internet of Things (IoT), Voice, Chatbot Development, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and Big Data
Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall - methodology to suit unique needs
Various customer success engagement models (Onshore, Offshore, and Hybrid)
 
Services We Offer
Custom Development in .NET MVC, Open Source, and Microsoft technologies
Mobile app development
Business Intelligence consultancy
Integration and Migration
IoT, Voice, and Machine Learning
Skills Development for Alexa, Google Home, and other smart speakers
READ MORE...
